◆ process()

MM1_RC_TPT_Output bdsp::filter::MM1_RC_TPT::process ( double x)

Definition at line 26 of file MM1_RC_TPT.cpp.

27 {
28 MM1_RC_TPT_Output out;
29
30 // Calculate output for low-pass
31 double v = g1 * (x - s);
32 double y = v + s;
33 out.lp = y;
34
35 // Update state register
36 s = v + y;
37
38 // Calculate output for high-pass
39 out.hp = x - y;
40
41 // Subtract low-pass output from input to find high-pass output
42 return out;
43 }

References g1, bdsp::filter::MM1_RC_TPT_Output::hp, bdsp::filter::MM1_RC_TPT_Output::lp, and s.

void bdsp::filter::MM1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff ( double cutoff)

Definition at line 45 of file MM1_RC_TPT.cpp.

46 {
47 // Calculate gamma from cutoff
48 const double w = bdsp::consts::TWO_PI * cutoff;
49 const double g = w / (2.0 * sample_rate);
50 g1 = g / (1.0 + g);
51 }

References g1, and sample_rate.

◆ set_cutoff_prewarp()

void bdsp::filter::MM1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff_prewarp ( double cutoff)

Definition at line 53 of file MM1_RC_TPT.cpp.

54 {
55 // Calculate gamma from prewarped cutoff
56 const double w_prewarped = mappings::prewarp(cutoff, sample_rate);
57 const double g = w_prewarped / (2.0 * sample_rate);
58 g1 = g / (1.0 + g);
59 }
bdsp::mappings::prewarp
float prewarp(const float freq, const float sample_rate)
Prewarp a frequency to be preserved in trapezoidal integration.
